Join

Why You Should Join!

Our Organization is always welcoming to new members. If you are interested in community service or self improvement, then Action Congress is definitely the place to be!

If you wish to make lasting friends and have a good time with others, we have plenty to go around.

If you prefer a more relaxed pace there are plenty of fun activities to enjoy together such as sports or events. Reach out and let us know what you think.

See the Contact page for more information.

Survey Form

To see if you may be a good fit for our organization, fill out this form here.

Thank you to our member Ryan Sherring, Director of External Affairs, for creating this form.



Our Purpose

We are an organization of students and young adults working to provide others with purpose through activities designed at strengthening community awareness and promoting personal growth.
